籤詩版本二:
Koni yebundo inokumbira chitubu, chinhu chakaoma kutsvaka basa rakaoma.
Pano neapo, ndinoerekana ndasangana neshamwari yangu yepamwoyo toenda kudenga takabata ruoko.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram cone pasi inotsvaga mufananidzo wechitubu.
Zvose zvakaoma zvisati zvave nyore gare gare.
解曰: Zvido nemafungiro. Kumadokero kunowanikwa. Zviri nani kusafamba. Pane nzvimbo inowanikwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Chen anosangana nemweya usingafi
MuMabvazuva eHan Dynasty, Liu Chen naRuan Zhaoguo vakaenda mumakomo kunonhonga maruva ndokusangana nemafairies maviri.
Vaviri vakachata neshura ndokudzokera kumusha papera hafu yegore.Havana kuziva kuti painge patopera makore zana vadzokera kumusha.
Hapana akavaziva, saka vakadzokera kumakomo kunotsvaka svikiro, asi havana kuriwana.
聖意: Namatira imba yako, kubatsirwa kwako, kuwana mari, kutengeserana, kuroora, kuchengetedzeka kweLiujia, vanhu, Chi Tian, ​​kudyara kwesirika, kurasikirwa nezvipfuwo, kutsvaga vanhu, kumatare edzimhosva, kutama, kurasikirwa kwezvinhu, chirwere nemakuva. muXingxing Mountain.
